sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    article.card.card-bg-large(:style="{backgroundImage: 'url(\"'+ preview.url +'\")'}")
        router-link(to="/" :style="{color: settings.feed_color_label}").card__hash {{type}}
        .card__content
            h3.card__title {{preview.title}}
            p.card__desc {{preview.description}}
            //- a(:href="preview.link").card__link
            router-link(:to="'/application/' + slug").card__link
                span More details
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Card',
    data: function() {
        return {}
    },
    props: {
        preview: {
            type: Object
        },
        type: {
            type: String
        },
        settings: {
            type: Object
        },
        slug: {
            type: String
        }
    },
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .card {
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center;
        background-size: cover;
        height: 388px;
        width: 100%;
        box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.08);
        border-radius: 6px;
        display: block;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        // background: linear-gradient(142.31deg, #FFBC77 6.92%, #FF8284 91.53%) !important;
        text-align: center;
        padding: 19px 0 88px 0;
        margin-bottom: 0;
        transition: .3s all ease;

        &:hover {
            box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.13);
        }

        &__hash {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay';
            font-weight: normal;
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 22px;
            // color: #59DDCD;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-bottom: 51px;
            // color:#EF3044;
        }

        &__content {
            color: #FFFFFF;
            max-width: 362px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay';
font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 40px;
            line-height: 34px;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }

        &__desc {
            font-family: 'Roboto';
            font-weight: 300;
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 22px;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

        &__link {
            width: 139px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #FFFFFF;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            border-radius: 100px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay';
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 10px;
            line-height: 19px;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            color: #37393E;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin: 0 auto;
            // position: relative;
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            bottom: 88px;
            transform: translateX(-50%);

            span {
                position: relative;
                z-index: 2;
            }

            &:hover {
                background: transparent;

                &:after {
                    opacity: 1;
                }
            }

            &:after {
                content: '';
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
                border-radius: 100px;
                border: none;
                position: absolute;
                top: 0;
                left: 0;
                opacity: 0;
                background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85));
                // transition: .3s all ease;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .card {
            height: 400px;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 18px 0 0 0;

            &__hash {
                margin-bottom: 58px;
            }

            &__content {
                max-width: 287px;
                margin-left: auto;
                margin-right: auto;
            }

            &__title {
                font-size: 33px;
                line-height: 36px;
            }
        }
    }
</style>
